subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Giants linebacker Antonio Pierce explained that stopping the league’s leading rusher, Clinton Portis, would be “Job 1, 2, 3, 4” in Sunday’s game with the Washington Redskins.
snippet: Giants linebacker Antonio Pierce explained that stopping the league’s leading rusher, Clinton Portis, would be “Job 1, 2, 3, 4” in Sunday’s game with the Washington Redskins.
